name: Remember Wonder (Patrickode, mattpalermo)
description:
Take a palm-sized elephant plushie on an adventure through the nursery of a suburban home, and collect motes of memory scattered across every nook and cranny by your 4-year-old owner and their parents!

Remember Wonder is a collectathon platformer inspired by Chibi Robo, Super Mario 64, and A Hat in Time, where young and old gamers alike can feed their childlike wonder and see the mundane world they take for granted from a novel, magical perspective.
